duties_responsibilities.duty: Greet and admit patients, complete admitting information in the computer, and locate/assign beds.
Responsible for proper communication of transfer information when patients are moved within or between hospital locations.
Perform clerical discharge functions and schedule follow-up appointments, transportation, and fill out discharge information.
Coordinate communication to ensure efficient intradepartmental and interdepartmental operations.
Answer phones and patient intercom and maintain accurate messages for department personnel.
Assist physicians and individuals with patient information and department routines, and enter written physician orders into the system.
Schedule lab work, x-rays, diagnostic procedures, and forward documents to appropriate individuals.
Maintain patient records, prepare identification bands, and maintain stock levels of office supplies.
Collect and compile accurate statistical or unit activity data for the department.

education_certification.credential: High School Diploma or equivalent (Medical Assistant program or secretarial school preferred)
